name: Zulfiqar
shortDescription: The Cleaver of Vertebrae - Sacred Bifurcated Sword of Imam Ali
fullDescription:
The Cleaver of Vertebrae - Sacred Bifurcated Sword of Imam Ali Zulfiqar (Arabic: ذو الفقار,Dhū al-Fiqār, "the one with the spine" or "cleaver of vertebrae")
                    stands as one of the most iconic and revered weapons in Islamic history and tradition. This legendary sword
                    is inextricably linked with Ali ibn Abi Talib, the cousin and son-in-law of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him),
                    and holds profound significance across both Sunni and Shia Islamic communities, though its veneration is particularly
                    prominent in Shia tradition.

properties.name: Primary Wielder
properties.value: Ali ibn Abi Talib, cousin of Prophet Muhammad

properties.name: Primary Significance
properties.value: Symbol of justice, courage, and righteous struggle
